title: Does Gas-Phase Sulfur Dioxide Remove Films of Atmosphere-Extracted Organic Material from the Aqueous Aerosol Air-Water Interface?

The reaction of gas-phase SO2 with unsaturated carbon-carbon double bonds forms organosulfates. Previous works have focused on reaction products and not the fate of organic films in the atmosphere. Neutron...
